resources.string: The projected trend of spendings in this month
How much is left to spend per remaining day in the month
Assuming equal spendings per day, how much money will be left over
User was not created, maybe username is already taken

Welcome to Budgeteer!

Budgeteer is a simple budgeting app, allowing you to categorize spendings quickly to keep an overview over your monthly goals. 

Enter a username and password of your choice and either create a new user or login as an existing one.

This is the main view, displaying your current spending categories and goals. 

You can customize this view using the settings button down left or add new categories with the + button down right.

Tap a category to add an expense, long tap to view the category details and edit it.
Input an expense for the current category either using the quick +/- buttons or by directly inputting a value

Edit an existing category or add a new one. A category is identified by its name and a monthly budget can be provided.\n\nThe trash can icon can be used to finally delete a categories and all entries for it.
Customize your app here, re-ordering/selecting the computed fields shown per category or setting the app currency symbol.
View the entries per category. Tap the trash icon to delete an entry or tap the entry to edit it. The pen button can be used to edit the category settings.

Welcome to Budgeteer!

There is nothing to see here yet, so add a category of spendings using the plus button on the bottom right.

Or feel free to adjust the settings first.
